panels.description: Height of the chain in blocks.
panels.title: Ledger Block Height per channel

panels.description: Time taken in seconds for committing block changes to state db.

panels.description: Time taken in seconds for ledger block processing.

targets.expr: sum by(job, chaincode) (rate(chaincode_shim_request_duration_sum{channel="$channel", chaincode!~"_lifecycle.*|cscc|qscc" , }[5m])) / sum by(job, chaincode) (rate(chaincode_shim_request_duration_count{channel="$channel", chaincode!~"_lifecycle.*|cscc|qscc", }[5m]))

panels.description: The number of chaincode shim requests received.
panels.title: Request Received - $channel

panels.description: The number of chaincode shim requests completed.
panels.title: Requests Completed - $channel
